meanings.definition: A type of cake made with cornmeal.
meanings.sent1: I baked a delicious corncake for dessert.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells fresh corncakes every morning.
meanings.sent3: Why did the corn refuse to be a corncake? It didn't want to crumble under pressure!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and comforting as a freshly baked corncake.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the corncake filled the kitchen, making everyone's mouth water.

meanings.definition: A cake-like bread made with cornmeal.
meanings.sent1: Grandma's corncake is always a hit at family gatherings.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served a delicious corncake with honey butter.
meanings.sent3: The corncake was so fluffy, it felt like biting into a cloud.
meanings.sent4: The golden crust of the corncake gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: As the corncake baked, the whole house smelled of sweet corn.

meanings.definition: A type of bread made with cornmeal.
meanings.sent1: I love to toast corncake slices for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The farmers market had a variety of freshly baked corncakes.
meanings.sent3: The corncake was so soft, it felt like a pillow for my taste buds.
meanings.sent4: The crumbs of the corncake scattered like tiny golden stars.
meanings.sent5: The corncake was the perfect accompaniment to the hearty stew.
